instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2915 fan problem
threads.message:
hi, i just work on that board.
it came in with gpu problem. after replacing it works everything fine.

now after 3 days i get it back to have a look.

after some minutes the fan begins randomly to run full for a second or half a second. then again noarmaly. 

i run now asd only sensor check about 1 hour but not failing, nut i hear the fan problem is there.

i gave the smc a refloow but still the same. 

is it a good idea to reball the smc ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-2915 fan problem
threads.message:
i run the asd fan test and it failed in "unable  to stabilize  between min  and max ....

replace the fan was resolving the problem :-)

so easy sometimes ...
